oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Visualizing Poetry: Tools for Critical Analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Meneses, Luis
Furuta, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poetry
Visualization
Critical Analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Although digital media allegedly privileges “distant reading”, we can develop toolsand methods to close-read and analyze documents. Moreover, these analyses can bevisualized before being discussed by readers. We have developed a set of visualization tools that aim to help scholars carry out thecritical analysis of poetry. More specifically, the purpose of the visualization tools is to help synthesize and bring forward the key elements found in poems.As results, we found that the tools we developed bring forward the graphicalelements of poetry. Additionally, our tools place special emphasis in viewing the poems from different perspectives and visualizing the textual representation of the poetic texts in their formal structure.
